text1: This project was funded through the GRIEG competition for interdisciplinary research projects, financed by Northern Financial Mechanism 2014-2021 (grant no. 2019/34/H/HS6/00597). The programme is operated by the National Science Centre Poland.
text2: Some of the conclusions presented in this report are based in part on research financed by the National Science Center, the beneficiary of which is the Institute of Psychology of the Polish Academy of Sciences (projects #2020/37/B/HS6/03142 and #2020/38/E/HS6 /00357).
